tool_description: Analyzes and categorizes damage patterns to determine causes, age of damage, and priority for conservation treatment using pattern recognition algorithms.

damage_severity.description: Severity level for each damage type (minor, moderate, severe, critical)

environmental_history.description: Known environmental exposures (flood, fire, UV, temperature fluctuation)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Mismatched array lengths: Damage observations and severity arrays must have same length.
Invalid severity levels: Use minor, moderate, severe, or critical for damage severity.
Empty damage observations: Must provide at least one damage observation to classify.
Unrecognized damage type: Damage observation contains unrecognizable damage description.
usage: Input observed damage types with severity levels. Tool classifies damage patterns, determines likely causes, and suggests treatment priorities.

damage_categories.description: Classified damage categories with probable causes

treatment_priority.description: Recommended priority order for addressing damage

cause_analysis.description: Analysis of likely causes for observed damage patterns
